field.name: thumbnails-caching
field.label: Agressive Thumbnails Caching
field.description: Resizing big images is a costly operation. Joomla set as default a cache of 900 seconds, meaning that every 900 seconds the resize will happen again for all images in the current gallery. If true thumbnails never expire and get created only once, as long as thumbnails exist in cache, they wont be created again even if module cache expire. To force the creation of thumbnails either empty the cache or remove the file manually. Default is true

field.name: debug
field.label: Debug extension
field.description: A file will be written at /logs/cedthumbnails.php containing always error and only debug informations if you set this flag to Yes.

field.name: useSafehosts
field.label: Use safe hosts
field.description: All images not being located on the list of safe hosts server will be replaced by the default image.

field.name: safeHosts
field.label: Safe Host
field.description: Only allow resize of host starting with (separated by semicolon).
